name: Inquisition of Kozilek
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.
flavor: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.
originalText: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

rulings.text: If you target yourself with this spell, you must reveal your entire hand to the other players just as any other player would.
